name: Mushu's journey
description:
This took way longer than expected but here we go! ANOTHER GAME.

Explore the house Mushu lives in with him! Use the arrows on your keyboard to move around. 

This one is for Mushu, my dog. Please enjoy~

** UPDATES 4/12/19**

I have made some additions to the game, there are now

  • 2 endings
  • 5 more rooms! 

I will try to expand this game day by day so drop by another time or leave a comment below on what you would like Mushu to do!
